channel.title: List of Secure Computation Papers
channel.description: A list of papers on IACR eprint on the topic of secure computation.

item.title: Secure MPC: Laziness Leads to GOD
item.description: Saikrishna Badrinarayanan and Aayush Jain and Nathan Manohar and Amit Sahai

item.title: PIR-PSI: Scaling Private Contact Discovery
item.description: Daniel Demmler and Peter Rindal and Mike Rosulek and Ni Trieu

item.title: Optimizing Authenticated Garbling for Faster Secure Two-Party Computation
item.description: Jonathan Katz and Samuel Ranellucci and Mike Rosulek and Xiao Wang

item.title: Fast Distributed RSA Key Generation for Semi-Honest and Malicious Adversaries
item.description: Tore Kasper Frederiksen and Yehuda Lindell and Valery Osheter and Benny Pinkas

item.title: Round-Optimal Secure Multiparty Computation with Honest Majority
item.description: Prabhanjan Ananth and Arka Rai Choudhuri and Aarushi Goel and Abhishek Jain

item.title: Limits of Practical Sublinear Secure Computation
item.description: Elette Boyle and Yuval Ishai and Antigoni Polychroniadou

item.title: Fast Large-Scale Honest-Majority MPC for Malicious Adversaries
item.description: Koji Chida and Daniel Genkin and Koki Hamada and Dai Ikarashi and Ryo Kikuchi and Yehuda Lindell and Ariel Nof

item.title: Homomorphic Encryption for Approximate Matrix Arithmetic
item.description: Jung Hee Cheon and Andrey Kim

item.title: Adaptive Garbled RAM from Laconic Oblivious Transfer
item.description: Sanjam Garg and Rafail Ostrovsky and Akshayaram Srinivasan

item.title: Must the Communication Graph of MPC Protocols be an Expander?
item.description: Elette Boyle and Ran Cohen and Deepesh Data and Pavel Hubacek

item.title: Ring packing and amortized FHEW bootstrapping
item.description: Daniele Micciancio and Jessica Sorrell

item.title: Location-Proof System based on Secure Multi-Party Computations
item.description: Aurélien Dupin and Jean-Marc Robert and Christophe Bidan

item.title: Highly Efficient and Reusable Private Function Evaluation with Linear Complexity
item.description: Osman Bicer and Muhammed Ali Bingol and Mehmet Sabir Kiraz

item.title: Secure Two-Party Computation over Unreliable Channels
item.description: Ran Gelles and Anat Paskin-Cherniavsky and Vassilis Zikas

item.title: Computer-aided proofs for multiparty computation with active security
item.description: Helene Haagh and Aleksandr Karbyshev and Sabine Oechsner and Bas Spitters and Pierre-Yves Strub

item.title: Secure Two-party Threshold ECDSA from ECDSA Assumptions
item.description: Jack Doerner and Yashvanth Kondi and Eysa Lee and abhi shelat

item.description: Ghada Dessouky and Farinaz Koushanfar and Ahmad-Reza Sadeghi and Thomas Schneider and Shaza Zeitouni and Michael Zohner

item.title: SPDZ2k: Efficient MPC mod 2^k for Dishonest Majority
item.description: Ronald Cramer and Ivan Damgård and Daniel Escudero and Peter Scholl and Chaoping Xing

item.title: On the Exact Round Complexity of Secure Three-Party Computation
